hotels.title: Breathtaking Five-Star Secluded Oasis with Views of the Himalayas
hotels.description: Escape to the enchanting Himalayan landscape of Bhutan and experience untouched luxuries with a stay at the COMO Uma Paro, a hidden oasis perched atop the tree-clad hills of Paro. Ground yourself each morning with a salute to the sun in the world-class yoga centre, and unlock your innner peace with a traditional Shambhala experience. Compliment your wellness journey with the signature COMO Shambhala cuisine, designed with seasonal healthful nutrition-optimised meals to nourish the mind, body and soul. This retreat combines traditional Bhutanese culture with contemporary living and offers a unique opportunity to become one with nature in the beautiful Paro Valley.
